'''1.10.2''' is a minor update to {{el|je}} released on June 23, 2016, which fixes bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=http://www.mojang.com/2016/06/minecraft-1101/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/http://www.mojang.com/2016/06/minecraft-1101/|title=Minecraft 1.10.2|author=Searge|website=Mojang.com|date=June 22, 2016}}</ref> It is compatible with [[Java Edition 1.10|1.10]] and [[Java Edition 1.10.1|1.10.1]] servers.

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
[[File:Witch JE2.png|width=50x50]] '''[[Witch]]'''
* The splash potion throwing sound is marked as Hostile Creatures instead of Friendly Creatures.

=== Gameplay ===
[[File:Speed JE1 BE1.png|width=32x32]] '''[[Speed]] effect'''
* Now works on a ridden [[pig]].
